sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import Navbar from './Navbar'
import { Box, Button, Container, Typography } from '@mui/material';

const DoctorDashboard = () => {
  return (
    <>
        <Navbar />
        <Container sx={{ mt: 5, display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', alignItems: 'center' }}>
        <Typography variant="h4" gutterBottom>
           Hi [DoctorName]
        </Typography>

        <Box sx={{ display: 'flex',
            flexDirection: 'column',
            gap: 2,
            mt: 4,
            width: '100%',
            maxWidth: '400px',
            p: 3,
            bgcolor: '#f0f0f0',  // Light grey background
            borderRadius: 2,
            boxShadow: 1 }} >
          <Button
              variant="contained"
              color="primary"
              fullWidth
              sx={{ borderRadius: '50px' }}
              onClick={() => window.location.href = '/appointments'} // Redirect to appointments page
            >
              Get Appointments
            </Button>
          <Button variant="contained" color="primary" fullWidth sx={{ borderRadius: '50px' }}>
            Mark Prescriptions
          </Button>
          <Button variant="contained" color="primary" fullWidth sx={{ borderRadius: '50px' }}>
            Get History
          </Button>
          <Button variant="contained" color="primary" fullWidth sx={{ borderRadius: '50px' }}>
            Generate Report
          </Button>
        </Box>
      </Container>
    </>
  );
};

export default DoctorDashboard
